i can not seem to be able to remove my n: I CAN'T REMOVE MY NVIDIA-GLX APP. ANY HELP!!!
any help for removing a nvidia-glx app???
ok, lets try reinstalling and uninstalling it
ok, try "sudo mkdir /usr/lib32" then "sudo apt-get --purge autoremove nvidia-glx"
ok, try "sudo cat /dev/null > /usr/lib32/libGL.so.1" then "sudo apt-get --purge autoremove nvidia-glx"
ok, try "sudo ls > /usr/lib32/libGL.so.1" then "sudo apt-get --purge autoremove nvidia-glx"
our goal is to create a file in /usr/lib32/libGL.so.1 so apt-get can remove it
do you still need help removing nvidia-glx?
